meanings.sent1: The quilt was patchiest with different colored squares sewn together.
meanings.sent2: Her jacket was the patchiest one in the group, with mismatched fabric pieces.
meanings.sent3: The patchiest lawn in the neighborhood looked like a colorful mosaic of grass.
meanings.sent4: His storytelling was as patchiest as a quilt made by many hands.
meanings.sent5: The old map was so patchiest that it seemed like a puzzle waiting to be solved.

meanings.definition: Inconsistent or uneven in quality or performance.
meanings.sent1: The service at the restaurant was patchiest, sometimes fast and other times slow.
meanings.sent2: Her work on the project was the patchiest among the team, with varying levels of effort.
meanings.sent3: The weather forecast was so patchiest that it was like playing a guessing game.
meanings.sent4: The singer's voice was as patchiest as a radio with bad reception.
meanings.sent5: The road was so patchiest that driving on it felt like riding a rollercoaster.
